Hi all.

I have just a simple question : will the MVVM Toolkit be available for Visual Studio 2010. For the moment, if we try to use the current version with VS2010, we get an error message.

PS : for those who want to use the MVVM Toolkit, you can follow these step for the moment :

  1. Create a new project in Visual Studio 2008 and save it;
  2. Open it with Visual Studio 2010 and migrate it so it can be launch with Visual Studio 2010;
  3. Go on the Project properties (Menu --> Project --> Properties of <Name of your project>) and change the target .NET framework to Framework .NET 4;
  4. You can now use the MVVM Toolkit with Visual Studio 2010 and the Framework .NET 4


Regards,
Tuttu
